title: Have you ever taught a student who was famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. I taught a very famous actress when she was 15 and in high school. You would know her. She is known all over the world. In class, in real life and not movie fantasy land, she was like any teen. She was a nervous, insecure little girl trying to find her way in the world. This is a challenging time that all teens face. We are all the same. Now she is successful, confident, and happy.

Yes, I had a student who was famous in Mexico. He was on the equivalent show to American Idol in Mexico. He had an amazing singing voice. However he was not a good student, and was amazed that I didn’t let him just slide by and give him a grade. I flunked him.
I once gave a set of private lessons to a high school student who had a course to finish she hadn’t earlier. She added me on facebook and I later learned that she’s a famous ice-skater. Meh.
No, l haven't. But I hope that one of my former students may become famous one of these days. He is a very promising nuclear physicist.
I’ve taught Politicians children and children of TV commentators.
